name: node-ecosystem-project
description: The goal of this project is to demonstrate your understanding of the basic node ecosystem. (Note - The modules we are installing are purely for practice and won't need to be installed in projects going forwards unless we need them) * Create a new package.json file * Install the [Moment](https://www.npmjs.com/package/moment) module * Install [Mocha](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mocha) as a dev dependency * Require Moment in Main.js and console.log the output * Run your project `node main.js`
